title: Junior Sales Manager (6-month internship)
content:
Teads is seeking a motivated Junior Sales Manager. As a part of our sales team, your primary focus will be to support the sale of our formats to key agencies throughout Milan.
Responsibilities:

Support to Prospect and close business within a targeted list of accounts
Support in building client relationships
Represent Teads in the online marketplace and become an active brand advocate
Work closely with Client Services, Ad Operations, and Sales Planning,  to ensure client campaign expectations are communicated internally

Your skills and experiences:
You are passionate about the world of online advertising, new media and you want to have a first experience in video and new advertising formats on the web.

Actually studying in a Business School or a Master Degree, you are looking for a 6 months internship (final year or gap year)
You are rigorous, organized and autonomous
Driven, passionate, and an ultimate team player
You have some business sense and good relationship skills
You control the basic functionality of the office pack
Fluent English appreciated

 
About Teads
Teads is The Global Media Platform. We have united and empowered the best publishers in the world and distribute ads to over 1.5 billion people every month within professionally-produced content. Through its end-to-end platform, Teads provides demand-side, sell-side and creative technology to deliver better media effectiveness for brands, better monetisation solutions for publishers, and better experiences for consumers.Teads partners with the leading marketers, agencies and publishers through a team of 800+ people in 26 countriesWe're committed to creating a dynamic work environment that values diversity and inclusion, and represents employees across a variety of skill sets. We embrace contributions from all ages, sexes, races, ethnicities, religions, sexual orientations and gender identities.
